question: ‘Shree Singaji Thermal Power Project’ is located in which district of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: This project is a coal-fired power plant located near Dongaliya village of Khandwa District in Madhya Pradesh.The project is owned by MPPGCL(Madhya Pradesh Power Generating company limited).It receives water from Indirasagar Dam a multipurpose project of Madhya Pradesh on the Narmada River.Two units of 600MW each were inaugrated by PM Narendra Modi on 5 March 2015.
